title: Why not put in a SKIN collection in the alpha?
body: I love this idea that we got a 'collection' to view in our new client. However, we can only view the champions we've got. If we can have a chance to view skins that we've already bought would be excited.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Something along the lines of a total net worth or something like;

Ultimate skins: 2
Legendary skins: 4
Legacy skins: 15

etc would be cool.  Maybe even being able to filter skin collections by rarity similar to something like Hearthstone type collection system.

Yeah, with those categories and the skins would be so cool. I hope they can make it like a collection of a book or something else, I just think I would be satisfied for seeing the skin collection{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
That would be fantastic for me. I cant keep track how it is.
It would be a good feature to see{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Totally agreed. Also in the champ's intro, it could be clearer to display skins on the [overview] page than to show them separately on the [skin] page. [skin] page now is kind of hiding too deep and not telling much stories.
Yeah, cuz actually each skin do have a story and collection, like the star guardians etc. RIOT really should consider to make them a collection{{item:3151}}
I literally just went and did a bug report about this. I'm sure they meant to incorporate it, it should already be there. Sure it's just a bug... pls rito.

I think that would be amazing, so you can quickly tell what champions you have skins or no skins for so whenever I see skins on sale I don't need to check whether I have skins for each champion {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeah despite the feeling of collecting skins, we do need to know what we've already got. I don't think it would be hard to add this skin collection. RIOT PLZ{{item:3151}}

Agreed, would be nice to admire my 50+ skins while in queue lol
well it was 50-60 last time i counted which was quite tedious going champ by champ and writing down skins I have lol{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Yeah I don't want to click my champs and view how many skins I've got everytime.{{item:3070}}
I'm liking that idea. could we also have a ward skin 'tab' within the skins{{item:3340}}
I would love this, after playing LoL for so long you start to lose track of all the skins you bought.

Would love to see this feature, as a DOTA 2 player as well I would love to preview my skin collections every now and then (I don't even know how much league skins I have). {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
